folder: McDonald Avenue & Avenue T, Brooklyn, NY
text:
(1)

2180 McDonald Ave., at the N.W. corner of Ave. T, showing a view of a Greek American Democratic Club. The side with the sign is Avenue T.

February 24, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)

The same, at a later date. The sign has been altered.

April 25, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
